description: If you play a musical instrument (or sing) it is important to keep in pitch. This skill will play a pitch perfect tone (to the concert A440 standard) for you to tune against your instrument. It can play from the first to the tenth octave. To hold a tone longer, ask it to "repeat". Or you can say another tone to play. If you want to cut it off, say "Alexa stop".
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask acoustic tuner to play middle c
Alexa, ask acoustic tuner to play a octave five
name: Acoustic Tuner
shortDescription: TsaTsaTzu's presents Acoustic Tuner for hands free, accurate, instrument  or vocal tuning. For help tuning your instrument mid-song.
